dashboardQueries.name: 25cb5574-b1ce-40e9-af8b-e29d9bc2a0bc
dashboardQueries.query:
metadata.vendor_name="Corelight"
metadata.product_event_type = "conn" 
observer.hostname!=""
principal.ip!=""
target.ip!=""
$service=about.labels["service"]
$is_broadcast=if(principal.ip="0.0.0.0" OR principal.ip="255.255.255.255" OR target.ip="255.255.255.255" OR target.ip="0.0.0.0","true","false")
$service!=""
$is_broadcast!="true"
match:
    target.port
outcome:
    $count=count_distinct(metadata.id)
order:
    $count desc 
limit:
    15

dashboardQueries.name: 237c693b-ee4e-4ba5-919a-018a2417480e
dashboardQueries.query:
metadata.vendor_name="Corelight"
metadata.product_event_type = "conn" 
observer.hostname!=""
principal.ip!=""
target.ip!=""
$service=about.labels["service"]
$is_broadcast=if(principal.ip="0.0.0.0" OR principal.ip="255.255.255.255" OR target.ip="255.255.255.255" OR target.ip="0.0.0.0","true","false")
$service!=""
$is_broadcast!="true"
match:
    $service
outcome:
    $count=count_distinct(metadata.id)
order:
    $count desc 
limit:
    15
